and there were a few times i noticed the apperance of a swirl of colored sparkles, first none, then size of a walnut, than spread to footbal size swirl of color lights. once i realized fully what i had encountered, by definition alone, i was quite spooked. oddly my wife & i are both christians, albiet pathetic ones. i immed perceived an intelligence watching us commit these total acts of degradation and debaquchery. we divorced ten years ago, i had been obsessed w\this bizzare sex and something had possessed me and deriven me deeper and deeper even when i no longer wanted any more; first drift down slow and smooth at fixed angle, others follow same angle but different places, after this intial viscous damped down angle movement, they each beco free at an equilent point of travel from start: thenmons arede they give swirl as they vanish-sort of. egaradless i saw same exact phenpomenon on amsterdam sado masochism w\women wearing strap on rubber dildo forcing it on man who had been feminized. these sparkles are infact malicious demonic spirits, ie fallen angels, i taped them several times indoors, perhaps they were careless, or very brazen in their hold upon me 13 years ago. these are the same beings that people see in the sky and foolishly attribute them to space vehicles...ufo's yes, vehicles no! spirit beings are ufo's.
